phrs.translation: 爆发（火灾，战争等爆发）；被提拔职务

sentences.sentence: But Mr Geronzi can draw on decades of power-broking in Rome.
sentences.translation: 但权力掮客杰龙齐可以动用数十年间在罗马的影响力。

sentences.sentence: It is easy to buy and sell shares worldwide now thanks to Internet stock broking.
sentences.translation: 感谢互联网股票经纪人们现在很容易购买和出售股票在全世界。

sentences.sentence: Besides, if ever there was a time when pay in banking and broking is likely to be depressed by the market, it is now.
sentences.translation: 此外，现在正是银行和经纪业由于市场疲软而薪酬低迷的时候。
